content: mini christmas tree garland this garland is a fun way to add a touch of christmas cheer to any home each tree only takes about 15-20 minutes to knit up making this a quick project that can also be used as decorations on your christmas tree or as a last minute gift measurements each tree measures approximately 3 25 x 4 25 8 x 11cm each pom pom measures approximately 2 5cm in diameter gauge n/a needle size use the recommended needle size for the yarn you are using i used us 6 4mm needles and a dk weight yarn yarn body of tree- dk weight sandnes garn peer gynt in the color 9572 8yds / 7m / 4g per tree trunk of tree- dk weight sandnes garn peer gynt in the color 2652 1yd / 1m / 0 5g per tree trunk pom poms- dk weight sandnes garn peer gynt in the color 1001 4yds / 4m / 2g per pom pom 1 yd/m of twine or yarn for hanging the garland notions yarn needle scissors all measurements and yardages are approximations and are rounded feel free to sell any items made from this pattern in small quantities no wholesale orders please and please give credit to my shop fibers and pines please do not sell copy or give my pattern away if you have any questions at any time please email at hello@fibersandpines com no returns or refunds can be accepted >>> instagram @fibersandpines thanks and happy knitting © 2024 fibers and pines all rights reserved
